nodes.text: The Hidden Cave was located in the Nightsister lair and was the home of Old Daka, who summoned the Army of the Dead to destroy the Separatist Droid Army which had attacked Dathomir. Normally accessible only by magick, the cave was breached during the battle when a commando droid blasted it with a rocket launcher. The destruction of the cave's entrance allowed General Grievous to murder Daka and disrupt Mother Talzin's voodoo torture of Count Dooku.
